comments.body: No muy mala idea

Translation:

Remove mohang banner it should be removed and replaced by one from microsoft, since minecraft is no longer mohang's domain
Please note, just putting "yes" or "no" is not constructive feedback on an idea. Please help your fellow community members improve their ideas by adding why you agree or disagree. Thanks.
What is the Great Beyond Dimension?
for costal vilages and might have a new type of boat
Boat update first maybe with pilotable ships that you can have your own crew of npcs in to fight off pirates. Also don't have to be illagers
Plz add to the game ü•∫
That cool doctor villager
I want villager who can heal other villagers or trade us potions of Healing for emeralds
i use to be an adventurer like you until i took an arrow to the knee. it's fine now it was a healing arrow but it still an arrow. XD
It's silly. The trader has Llamas, but what for? He doesn't ride them, so what does he use them for? This Is a great idea. It has my vote!
I kill the traders and keep the llamas.

I voted for the idea because it is a good one but that means llamas should be able to carry chests like donkeys so that the wandering trader can actually move the chests somehow. I support that idea but I think it‚Äôs a better idea to add the feature were you can only buy the lamas if the wandering trader puts it on sale, the llamas would have a name tag that says ‚Äúon sale‚Äù
Yes! and the old villager texture does not go completely unused!
Yes!!!! And depending on the villager's profession, they would have the corresponding old robe!
They will celebrate like illagers.
This really is a good idea
It should carry an iron axe with knockback.
I totally imagine a gladiator-like aesthetic with this
Yas.
maybe it could have varios redstone contraptions (some of which are broken and make no sense) voted.
A very interesting thought. I 100% agree with this.
Can It defended the village?
It should not defend the village, as villagers are pacifist, but it may hunt passive mobs, (like cows and sheep) and maybe tame wolves. (which would defend the village)
I think they implemented this in java. So maybe it will come to bedrock as well?

Yeah - even though they're not technically existing mobs yet, I have to agree. I was on a river and got dragged out of my boat by a horde of them in the beta before they introduced 'experimental gameplay'. I was single player on easy mode üò®

Having them spawn as suggested would be brilliant as obtaining the associated books further feeds into that desire for 'the adventure'. I'm not sure as to whether it is a good idea to be dragged out of your boat in the middle of the ocean though...
What do you mean noob1884? The drowned are already existing mobs. Also, how were you dragged out of a boat?

Yes, they dragged me out of my boat, one minute I was in it and the next I was in the river surrounded by drowned (at least that's how I remember it!).  I'm trusting that doesn't happen in the released version.  Already I've noticed that there aren't so many of them in normal rivers (perhaps because mobs haven't had time to drown in great numbers yet!)

oh, I should say that I got full aquatic yesterday so the comments about them not being in great numbers refers to my observations on realms in that time.  Already I've seen 2 people get tridents from the drowned so that's cool :)
great idea! also they should be in an egg in creative mode. they could be good as soldiers in a castle.
Yeah forgot about that and thanks . üëç that's exactly what I'm going for here wanting to take the Steve mob and make it something better . like they did with pigmen who were original mobs .
I don't know about it being steve, maybe just some kind of generic humanoid or something like a copper golem..?
Steve guards is a really great idea I voted.
Thank you so much
I want to play with you
Maybe rarely, they can sell rare items that only you can find when scrummaging through the Archaeology Sites!
Landen that would be cool however I would think that those items would cost a lot of emeralds, and one would have to wait till mastery
It would also be I teresting if instead of spawning in village they have a chance to spawn at an archeological dig site. As another cool a rare encounter tango along with finding the site.
they should also trade a very limited amount (12/restock) of certain ores like lapis and coal so you can have renewable sources of them but not have an OP amount
I like the concept, but I don't want iron farms 2.0 a.k.a. copper farms. This farm would further make mining irrelevant.

I disagree since allowing blaze powder to drop in the Overworld means that there is no need to go to the nether to brew potions (or at least weakness potions) so it is better to leave something in the Nether.

Even though that would be the case Gundabadguy, how often do you see witches in the game? Getting blaze rods is a much faster method than trying to get blaze powder that has a 5% chance of dropping from a witch.

I (somewhat) disagree. I think Piglins should have a chance to barter blaze powder instead of witches because witches dropping them would be a Story-Breaker Mob, allowing you to skip the nether when you go to the end.

It would be great if they visually hold it in there offhand and consume it after 32 ticks (1.6 seconds) similar to players.

May also apply to Golden carrots and Golden apple but considering they are greedy, maybe not.
it makes sense and it would be cool to see it in the game
394157612871 i think the notion that they are greedy creatures is misguided. ever consider they're hoarding gold because they want to make netherite?

That would be so hard to program but would change Minecraft for the better, I like it

But they should also make villager eat breed or whatever food is in there inventory, and mole people should eat whatever, mob provides a food source in this new cave update.
These could have neutral Illagers that don't trade but will possibly barter with you
thank you soo much for  voting my yt channel is  coming soon so stay tuned
1 emerald for 2-4 iron seems like a better trade to me.
Would be great for peaceful survival players :)

I hate the Villager torturing, friendly flower Giant murdering situation. Since Hoppers were introduced we need masses of iron. So now I mine 70% of a redstone build for iron. It would be only logical to have a Villager sell iron. STOP THE TORTURING AND SLAUGHTERING
I think that's what the pig people will be
Any more information?
Look at my post I worked it out...  Why they should add it to the game.. Only my post has to be approved..
I mean if they can sleep they can live

They should also trade you nothing for your emeralds on april fools, they'd be like SIKE those are MY emeralds.

xD
I like this idea but maybe adding some other possible drops

I like the idea, but having another villager work alongside you would add a whole new complexity about how you would control them. Also, the leaf clothing is a cool idea, but wait until they add individual leaves before you put ideas out there like that.
Is it great?
Nah. I don't think makes sense. Why would "villagers" not be in "villages"?
Like lost villagers that's why they are far away from their villages and become uncivilized Villagers.I kinda like this villager to be in the game.New villager characteristics.
Villagers should eat meat, like real life people
Don't forget baked potatoes!

Meat might be difficult to program.  The farmers are actually collecting the crops (and turning wheat into bread), which they store in their inventory and share with other villagers.  Fisher villagers could probably be programmed to actually add fish to their inventory over time while at their job site block, which they could then share with other villagers, but programming butchers to slaughter and breed animals, without accidentally killing all of them, might be a bit finicky.  Maybe they could be programmed to respond to the number of animals inside of a pen - if there are only two adults, breed them, if there's two adults and a baby, leave them alone, and if there's three adults, kill one - but that might be difficult.  Not sure, I suck at programming.
Sounds nice maybe you can find pirate docks and raid there ships and fight pirates
